full_summary:
Field Support Services Project (FSSP) - Colombia and Ecuador
======================================================

**Tender Reference:** CB-2023-848-82095958

**Publication Date:** January 30, 2024
**Closing Date:** March 13, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)

**Amendment:** The tender is subject to Amendment 3, dated January 30, 2024.

**Objective:**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) Canada seeks to engage a contractor to provide field support services for its bilateral development programs in Colombia and Ecuador. The primary objective is to enhance the efficiency of program and project stakeholders, as well as the impact of Canada's international assistance in both countries.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful contractor will be responsible for providing technical analysis and advice, monitoring Canada's development assistance investments, and supporting emerging Canadian development priorities. The services will include:

* Technical analysis and advice on Canada's priority themes, sectors, and initiatives
* Monitoring of Canada's development assistance investments, including results reporting and risk assessment
* Support for emerging Canadian development priorities

**Geographic Scope:**
The project will primarily focus on Colombia (approximately 75% of the indicative work) and will also cover Ecuador (approximately 25% of the indicative work).

**Expected Outcomes:**
The expected results of the Field Support Services Project are to enhance the relevance of Canada's programming in Colombia and Ecuador by addressing local development challenges and opportunities that will benefit the most marginalized and vulnerable populations in both countries.

**Tender Process:**
This tender is a competitive, open bidding process (Request for Proposal) in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Notice Documents:**
Please refer to the comprehensive tender notice in English [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30845/23-236864---rfp---fss---colombia-and-ecuador---dfatd.pdf) or French [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30845/23-236864---ddp---psat---colombie-et-equateur---maecd.pdf).

Contact Information:
Grant Bott
grant.bott@international.gc.ca
(613) 791-6758

**Note:** The tender is subject to cancellation. No amendments or updates will be provided once the tender has been cancelled
